{{Description|A skirmisher with the ability to generate a Geo Shield and defend their allies.<br />Unlike the elite Mages and Agents, Fatui Skirmishers are soldiers of lesser individual might.<br />To complete their tasks and reduce losses in men and materiel, their tactics are thus more reliant on teamwork.|[[Archive]]}}

==Abilities and Attacks==
*'''Rock Strike:''' Shoots a rock projectile from their staff, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Geo DMG}} on hit.
**'''Enhanced:''' When their '''Geo Armor''' is active, shoots 3 projectiles at once in different directions, dealing '''150% ATK''', '''75% ATK''', '''37.5% ATK''' respectively as {{Color|Geo DMG}} with each hit.
*'''Blink:''' Teleports away if the player strays too close. This ability is only used when their '''Geo Armor''' is active.
*'''Jade Dome:''' If an ally is nearby, forms a large dome around themselves that blocks ranged projectiles and increases [[Attack|ATK]] of all allies inside the dome by '''20%'''. This ability is only used when their '''Geo Armor''' is active.
*'''Geo Armor:''' Upon reaching '''50%''' HP or after some time has passed, generates a {{Geo}} [[Shields|shield]], granting them a massive increase in [[Resistance]]s and enhancing their abilities. The shield takes [[Poise Damage]], with [[Blunt Attack]]s being especially effective. Breaking the shield will leave them stunned and vulnerable to attack.
